(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD went)
      (ADVP (RB down)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Big) (NNP Ben) (POS 's))
            (NNS Pies))))
      (NP (JJ last) (NN month))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (PRP$ my) (NN son) (RB only)))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB find)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (EX there))
                (VP (VBD were)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ whole) (NN lot))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NNS contractors))
                        (PP (IN at)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT the) (NN shop))
                            (SBAR
                              (WHNP (WP who))
                              (S
                                (VP (VBD told)
                                  (NP (PRP me))
                                  (SBAR (IN that)
                                    (S
                                      (NP (DT the) (NN shop))
                                      (VP (VBD had)
                                        (VP (VBN changed)
                                          (NP (NNS owners)))))))))))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(went-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, went-2)
advmod(went-2, down-3)
prep(down-3, to-4)
nn(Ben-6, Big-5)
poss(Pies-8, Ben-6)
possessive(Ben-6, 's-7)
pobj(to-4, Pies-8)
amod(month-10, last-9)
tmod(went-2, month-10)
prep(went-2, with-11)
poss(son-13, my-12)
pobj(with-11, son-13)
advmod(son-13, only-14)
aux(find-16, to-15)
xcomp(went-2, find-16)
mark(were-19, that-17)
expl(were-19, there-18)
ccomp(find-16, were-19)
det(lot-22, a-20)
amod(lot-22, whole-21)
nsubj(were-19, lot-22)
prep(lot-22, of-23)
pobj(of-23, contractors-24)
prep(contractors-24, at-25)
det(shop-27, the-26)
pobj(at-25, shop-27)
nsubj(told-29, who-28)
rcmod(shop-27, told-29)
dobj(told-29, me-30)
mark(changed-35, that-31)
det(shop-33, the-32)
nsubj(changed-35, shop-33)
aux(changed-35, had-34)
ccomp(told-29, changed-35)
dobj(changed-35, owners-36)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ My) (NN son))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN devastated)
        (SBAR (IN because)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Big) (NNP Ben) (POS 's))
              (NNS pies))
            (VP (VBD were)
              (NP (PRP$ his) (NN favorite)))))))
    (. .)))


poss(son-2, My-1)
nsubjpass(devastated-4, son-2)
auxpass(devastated-4, was-3)
root(ROOT-0, devastated-4)
mark(favorite-12, because-5)
nn(Ben-7, Big-6)
poss(pies-9, Ben-7)
possessive(Ben-7, 's-8)
nsubj(favorite-12, pies-9)
cop(favorite-12, were-10)
poss(favorite-12, his-11)
advcl(devastated-4, favorite-12)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (RB So) (JJ ,)))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD updated)
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (DT the) (NN blog)))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NN shop))
          (VP (VBD had)
            (VP (VBN closed))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(updated-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, updated-2)
prep(updated-2, on-3)
det(blog-5, the-4)
pobj(on-3, blog-5)
mark(closed-10, that-6)
det(shop-8, the-7)
nsubj(closed-10, shop-8)
aux(closed-10, had-9)
ccomp(updated-2, closed-10)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB However))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, However-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (PP
        (ADVP (DT a))
        (ADJP (JJ few)))
      (ADVP
        (NP (NNS weeks))
        (RBR later)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, a-1)
dep(a-1, few-2)
npadvmod(later-4, weeks-3)
dep(a-1, later-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN someone))
    (VP (VBD wrote)
      (PRT (RP in))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB say)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (NNP Big) (NNP Ben) (POS 's))
                (VP (VBD was)
                  (ADVP (RB still))
                  (ADJP (JJ alive)
                    (CC and)
                    (RB well)))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(wrote-2, someone-1)
root(ROOT-0, wrote-2)
prt(wrote-2, in-3)
aux(say-5, to-4)
xcomp(wrote-2, say-5)
mark(alive-12, that-6)
nn(Ben-8, Big-7)
nsubj(alive-12, Ben-8)
possessive(Ben-8, 's-9)
cop(alive-12, was-10)
advmod(alive-12, still-11)
ccomp(say-5, alive-12)
cc(alive-12, and-13)
advmod(alive-12, well-14)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (RB So) (JJ ,)))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB quickly))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD brought)
        (NP (PRP$ my) (NN son))
        (ADVP (RB down))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB investigate)
              (CC and)
              (VB lo)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD behold)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(brought-3, I-1)
advmod(brought-3, quickly-2)
root(ROOT-0, brought-3)
poss(son-5, my-4)
dobj(brought-3, son-5)
advmod(brought-3, down-6)
aux(investigate-8, to-7)
xcomp(brought-3, investigate-8)
cc(investigate-8, and-9)
conj(investigate-8, lo-10)
cc(brought-3, and-11)
conj(brought-3, behold-12)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (CONJP (RB not) (JJ only))
    (S
      (VP (VBD was)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Big) (NNP Ben))
          (SBAR
            (S
              (VP (VBZ 's)
                (ADJP
                  (ADJP (JJ alive))
                  (CC and)
                  (ADVP (RB well))
                  (, ,))))))))))


neg(only-2, not-1)
dep(Ben-5, only-2)
cop(Ben-5, was-3)
nn(Ben-5, Big-4)
root(ROOT-0, Ben-5)
cop(alive-7, 's-6)
rcmod(Ben-5, alive-7)
cc(alive-7, and-8)
advmod(alive-7, well-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD had)
        (VP (VBN undergone)
          (NP (DT a) (NN makeover))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD was)
        (ADVP (RB now)))
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ cosy) (JJ little) (NN place))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBD looked)
              (ADJP (RB very) (JJ much)
                (PP (IN like)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN pie) (NN shop))))
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (VP (MD would)
                    (VP (VB find)
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (NNP Britain))))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(undergone-3, it-1)
aux(undergone-3, had-2)
root(ROOT-0, undergone-3)
det(makeover-5, a-4)
dobj(undergone-3, makeover-5)
cc(undergone-3, and-6)
conj(undergone-3, was-7)
advmod(was-7, now-8)
det(place-12, a-9)
amod(place-12, cosy-10)
amod(place-12, little-11)
dobj(undergone-3, place-12)
nsubj(looked-14, that-13)
rcmod(place-12, looked-14)
advmod(much-16, very-15)
acomp(looked-14, much-16)
prep(much-16, like-17)
det(shop-20, a-18)
nn(shop-20, pie-19)
pobj(like-17, shop-20)
nsubj(find-23, you-21)
aux(find-23, would-22)
ccomp(looked-14, find-23)
prep(find-23, in-24)
pobj(in-24, Britain-25)
